Actions.Name: Shock
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is shattered.

Actions.Name: Chain Lightning
Actions.AreaEffect: A foe in range 3 from the attack target must save or take [D]. If they fail the save, this effect repeats, choosing a new foe in range 3 of them instead. A character can be hit multiple times by this effect and it can 'bounce' back and forth.
